briefTitle: An Observational Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Combination With Paclitaxel in First-Line Treatment in Patients With HER2-Negative Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Non-interventional Study of Avastin in Combination With Paclitaxel for First Line Treatment in HER2 Negative Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult patients, \>/= 18 years of age
* Locally recurrent or metastatic breast cancer
* No prior treatment for metastatic or locally recurrent disease
* Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status 0-2

Exclusion Criteria:

* History or clinical evidence of brain metastases
* Pregnancy
* Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic \> 150 mmHg and/or diastolic \> 100 mmHg) or clinically significant (i.e. active) cardiovascular disease
* Major surgical procedure or significant traumatic injury within 28 days prior to enrolment
